title: Settings
verifyEmailDescription: For your security and a better experience, please verify your email address. We will send you a verification link to the email associated with your account.
saveError: Could not save settings. Please try again.
verifyEmailMissingToken: Verification link is invalid. Missing token or id.
verifyEmailSuccess: Email verified successfully. You can continue using Loventia.
verifyEmailGenericError: Email verification failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
verifyEmailPageVerifyingMessage: Please wait while we verify your email address with Loventia.
verifyEmailAlreadyVerifiedHint: If this link was already used before, you may see a message saying that your email is already verified. That is normal.
